name: Richard Smith
description: My name is Richard Smith, I´m 45 years of age I´m originally from maryland in Baltimore city, I´m 5.7 feet tall 120lbs I´m single never been married and no kids I am really a sincere and honest person.am caring,kind,friendly very easy to get a long with loving,caring, honest am,social,romantic,passionate.smart,intelligent,cool headed,adaptive,have a big heart and i do believe in the truth and honesty..
